posts.content:
Here forsale is a very rare 1977 jurgens autovilla
south africa import never seen road salt
original paint , never welded
only 1000 units produced and around 10 in UK so a very rare
sight on uk roads




this is a great example if you have been looking for one off these this is your dream bus
original paint NO FILLER ,NO BODGED WELDING
a few age related dings but adds to the character
og hubcaps
og logos

inside the interior is original ,including upholstery and flooring ,2 burner stove with grill
sink with 12v tap ,propex gas heater
bathroom with sink ,shower and space for your porta loo
large electrolux gas fridge
large double bed above cab big enough for adults
table folds down to make rear bed
and also included cab hammock

2.0 aircooled type 4 engine in the back pulls strong and cruises at 60-65 with ease
this is an exchange unit fitted by vw south africa 20.000 miles ago with reciepts to prove
pushrod seals just replaced and serviced

comes with full service stamps and history from vw SA it had an easy life there

also included jurgens crockery
original awning
cab hammock
wheel chocks
og step

if you need any other pics of info please ask
it has a agreed insurance value of 18000
but price is negotiable i dont bite
07779851119
ellmackness AT hotmail.co.uk

link to pics here http://www.thesamba.com/vw/classifieds/ ... id=1657507
